A987654321098181478     #   batch totals
B123451234577151478     #   user owes $1514.78
C13571357242401000015   #   15 * (item @ $100) = 1500;  '150000'
C24682468131300073902   #   2 * (item @ $7.39) = 14.78; '001478'
B918273645501030000     #   user owes $300
C13571357242401000003   #   3 * (item @ $100) = 300;  '030000'
